entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reflection free mode: using sqlclient - possible options for obfuscation #96339
  • "No LC_RPATH's found" when loading native libraries on macOS #96337
  • CG2-specific failure in JIT/Intrinsics/TypeIntrinsics_r.csproj and TypeIntrinsics_ro.csproj #96336
    9.0.0
  • Emit `Producers` section when compiling to wasm #96334
  • Startup regression on Linux in TE benchmarks #96331
  • XmlSerializer doesn't allow to specify a fallback Timezone when deserializing to DateTimeOffset #96329
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization rafactor condition checks #96328
  • Debug.Assert exception I encountered when using Debug version System.Private.CoreLib.dll with mono runtime #96324

Closed

  • DateTime.ToString with different behavior from local machine and Azure DevOps #96335
  • [API Proposal]: Add `ArgumentOutOfRangeException.ThrowIfNotZero` #84415
  • unexpected exception in C# dynamic method invocation with optional struct parameter in .NET48 #96330
  • .NET 8 macOS *.app does not launch after code signing #95727

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT] Creation of unsuspendable threads does not need to synchronize with the caller. #96338
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Clean up testgrouping.proj and move JIT/Intrinsics under JIT.1 #96333
    area-Infrastructure
  • [WIP][mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT mini job on extra platforms #96332
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Inline properties during importation #96325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Add extra trimming warning suppression #96327
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Fix wasm Codespaces prebuild #96326
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Build Linux NativeAOT runtime packs #96323
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Improve branch optimizer around implied relops #95234
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Faster lookup for method infos on Windows. #96283
    os-windows, tenet-performance, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Allow specifying IndentText when writing JSON #95292
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono][ios] Enable fullAOT mode for runtime tests #92523
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Allow valuetype sharing in wrappers for valuetypes with an explicit l… #96230
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Intrinsify typeof(T).IsPrimitive #96226
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enhance OSX's ProcessManager to extract process names from their paths #96287
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • CallSiteValidator doesn't cache results of the walk #96254
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • PGO: Profile Buffer.Memmove's length #96311
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Add crossgen2 for riscv64 #95188
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Delete `GT_CNS_LNG` #85951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete simple quirks left from the `ASG` removal #86726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `BBF_FAILED_VERIFICATION` and `BBF_FUNCLET_BEG` #93483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove more `ASG` terminlogy from the codebase #86760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] JSImport dispatch to target thread via JSSynchronizationContext #96319
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Implements more advanced ILLink/ILCompiler analysis for Type.GetMember #94879
    community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [HybridGlobalization] Fix xamarin_macios build after system ICU change #96270
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [wip] [mono] Enable some of the disabled JIT/Directed/callconv/ runtime tests #96243
    needs-area-label
  • Use corresponding exception message, if null passed #90505
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Allow preinitializing `AppContext.TryGetSwitch` #95948
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Cleanup some string operating functions #96099
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • A few optimizations for the gcinfodecoder construction #96150
    tenet-performance, area-VM-coreclr
